Package com.cyberfront.crdt.sample.simulation

Class SimOperationManager<T extends AbstractDataType>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cyberfront.crdt.operation.OperationManager
      • com.cyberfront.crdt.operation.GenericOperationManager<T>
        • com.cyberfront.crdt.sample.simulation.SimOperationManager<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of object to which the operations is applied. In this case T should extend the AbstractDataType class
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<OperationManager>
    public class SimOperationManager<T extends AbstractDataType>
extends GenericOperationManager<T>
    The SimOperationManager class wraps JSON operations with some management code to ensure proper delivery and processing of the operations specifically tailored for the simulation test harness.

        public SimOperationManager​(OperationManager.StatusType status,
                           Operation operation,
                           java.util.UUID objectId,
                           java.lang.Class<T> objectClass)
        Instantiates a new operation manager.
        Parameters:
        status - Status of the operation being managed, either APPROVED, PENDING or REJECTED
        objectId - the object id
        objectClass - the object class
        operation - the operation

      • SimOperationManager

        public SimOperationManager​(OperationManager.StatusType status,
                           Operation operation,
                           java.util.UUID objectId,
                           java.util.UUID referenceId,
                           java.lang.Class<T> objectClass)
        Instantiates a new operation manager.
        Parameters:
        status - Status of the operation being managed, either APPROVED, PENDING or REJECTED
        operation - the operation
        objectId - the object id
        referenceId - Identifier of the operation which initiated this operation
        objectClass - the object class

      • getReferenceId

        public java.util.UUID getReferenceId()
        Retrieve the identifier for the operation which prompted the creation of this operation. This value will be null when there is no initiating operation
        Returns:
        The ID for the reference operation which prompted the creation of this opeation.

        public SimOperationManager<T> copy​(OperationManager.StatusType status)
        Generate and return a copy of this class instance including the operation identifier but with the given status type
